tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HealthcareData (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  prescription TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  diagnosis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  experience_years INT,
  hospital_name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_name VARCHAR(50),
	patient_age INT,
	patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
	patient_address VARCHAR(100),
	patient_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE doctor_info (
	doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
	doctor_specialty VARCHAR(50),
	doctor_experience INT,
	doctor_qualifications TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE hospital_info (
	hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	hospital_name VARCHAR(100),
	hospital_location VARCHAR(50),
	hospital_capacity INT,
	hospital_services TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
	appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	doctor_id INT,
	hospital_id INT,
	appointment_date DATE,
	appointment_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
  doctor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  specialization VARCHAR(255),
  availability BOOLEAN,
  hospital VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  doctor_id UUID,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Medications (
  medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  side_effects TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Diagnostics (
  diagnostic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  doctor_id UUID,
  diagnostic_type VARCHAR(50),
  result TEXT
)
